thread.title_full: From Glee To Heartbreak! Lauren Potter Reveals Her Engagement Has Been Called Off! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: From Glee To Heartbreak! Lauren Potter Reveals Engagement Been Called Off!
text:
She will go on!
Glee 's Lauren Potter has broken up with fianc√© Timothy Spear , from whom she accepted a promise ring back in August. So sad.
Related: This Instagram Couple Have A Savage Breakup 
The actress revealed to People on Wednesday: 
"It hurts. After we got married I wanted to wake up and see him make breakfast for me. I loved him so much."
Awww!
Lauren's mother Robin Sinkhorn explained that Spear could not handle all the publicity that came with dating a Hollywood star, saying:
"He did not like the publicity. It was overwhelming."
However, Lauren is not crying in her room over the breakup. Instead, the 26-year-old has been hitting the gym to get ready for bikini season, going out on dates, and trying to get a job at Starbucks if Hollywood doesn't come calling again.
Sounds like exactly the way to handle life after a breakup. You go, Lauren!
[ Image via WENN . ] 
Tags: breakups , glee , lauren potter , love line , timothy spear
